message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life. This is referring to depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a specific line item called "Depreciation" with a value of 45757.71 on 2024-01-29.

Depreciation represents the systematic allocation of the cost of a tangible asset over its useful life, which matches what I'm looking for.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45757.71'} }
```
